reviews.review:
de longe um dos meus jogos favoritos de todos os tempos
música: fenomenal
gameplay: espetacular
história: perfeita
é um combo completo e que pode ser facilmente comprado nas promoções por 4 reais, obrigatório pra todo mundo que joga ter zerado portal 2
Very good game
amazinf game

TLDR: Absolutely amazing sequel to the original, now just waiting for Valve to count to 3.

Graphics:
Despite being from 2011 it looks on par with games releasing today. Absolutely amazing!

Storyline:
In the single player it's amazing. It catches your attention, twists your expectations, and resolves beautifully. The multiplayer one is sadly quite the opposite, I'm still not sure what happened.

Price:
The price is absolutely perfect.

Difficulty:
As long as you have plenty of time to solve puzzles you'll be perfectly fine.

AI:
Basic, just aims at you.

Cutscenes:
Valve uses non-intrusive cutscenes where you can still move around while things happen - and I love it. It's both immersion and story building.

Fun:
I can't really say much other than it's really fun. You will get stumped at times but you will 100% enjoy the experience.

Sounds/Music:
The music in this game is phenomenal and I'm hoping it's on Spotify.

Replayability:
I could definitely see both the singleplayer and multiplayer being replayed. It's a god tier game.

Controls:
They're perfect. Valve took complex ideas and simplified it into an understandable system that in total uses around 8 buttons.

Performance:
It will run perfectly on any hardware.

Modding:
Due to it being a Valve game you will find mods for absolutely anything. I'm serious, search for it, you'll find it.

Selling Out:
The only thing Valve tries to sell to you along with the game is a digital book which gives you insight on the development of the game. It's a great addition tbh.

Similar Games:
The best that comes to mind is Q.U.B.E. 2 (great game!)

Bugs:
I experienced none

Enquanto no Portal 1 a sua história era bem mais simples e sútil, o Portal 2 aprofunda tudo que a gente tinha visto até então trazendo até uma conexão definitiva com a história do Co-op com a da Campanha Principal além de uma solução inesperada para o chefão final que eu particularmente achei muito daora. Agora não tem como não falar do nível massante de fases desse jogo que por mais que já cansava de certa forma no primeiro jogo, aqui eles multiplicaram as fases 10 vezes mais do que no Portal 1 que definitivamente prejudicou muito a minha experiência fazendo com que eu demorasse bem mais tempo para zerá-lo, mas dá para ver claramente uma evolução enorme ao primeiro e o porquê ele é tão adorado pela comunidade Gamer...

[h1]Buy this instead of Portal 1[/h1]
This game is infinitely better than its prequel. The story is better, the graphics are better, it's more entertaining than Portal 1, just everything is so much better in this game. I bought both Portal games for $2.50 USD during the winter sale, but I can't force myself to play the first game. This game is mainly better because someone is talking to you 99% of the time. The original game is the complete opposite. Silence.
I don't know if Portal 1 gets better as you play, but for now I'm going to stick with this game. :)

Buy the game, play the game, make life take the lemons back.

This is one of the most amazing games the world has ever seen. Portal 2 is everything a sequel should be. Portal 2 expands on the original mechanics of Portal and makes them even better. The story, game play, graphics, comedy are all so creative to create this wonderful experience. And this game only gets better when you play the multiplayer friend. Now there's even more interesting and creative content with four portals that you can enjoy with a friend. All of this only costing $10, its worth six times that amount. Everything here is quotable, the characters are hilarious and interesting, as is the lore you can piece together through Easter eggs and listening to the characters. If you are considering to buy this game I would wholeheartedly recommend it. Pick up Portal while your at it, also a fantastic game.

And, if you're sad you won't be able to have the same experience again, worry not, this game has multiplayer, AND you can create your own levels! I enjoyed this game so much.

Фактически игра представляет из себя череду изолированных друг от друга уровней с заданиями, не выполнив которые, не пойдешь дальше. Собственно, задание каждый раз одно: пройти к выходу. Для выполнения заданий требуется сообразительность и трехмерное мышление. Используя заданный ландшафт и геометрию стен и определенные приспособления для перемещения, подпрыгивания и телепортации, активируя хитроумные механизмы и лазерные лучи - туннели, надо проложить себе дорогу в выходу из уровня. Вам противостоят роботы охранники, коварные ловушки и гравитация.
Чтобы распланировать путь к выходу, надо быть хорошим стратегом. Наобум, методом тыка проходить игру практически невозможно. Здесь важно планирование и точность движений. Кроме шахматной расчетливости очень хорошо тренируется трехмерное мышление. Поэтому, во время игры время попусту не теряется - это отличный тренажер для мозга.

This game is a good sequel to a good game. If you like Portal 1 you will like Portal 2. Everything Portal 1 does great Portal 2 does great aswell. The Game expands upon the foundation laid by Portal 1, by making the puzzles more complex (by adding extra mechanics), by adding a new funny sidekick, and introducing co-op mode. These extra additions make the game seem like a new game but still a Portal game

우선 전작의 별거 없는 스토리를 강화시켰고 그외 협동 플레이(즉 코옵) 추가와 (대신 같이 하는 사람이 빡대가리라면 협동플레이는 거의 못하게 될거임) 새로운 플레이 방식 추가(전작에선 무작정 포탈건만 이용해 스테이지를 깼다하면 여기선 젤, 유도 터널, 공중 신뢰 플레이트 등으로 더 많은 추가 요소들이 생겨 이것들로 스테이지를 클리어 할 수 있음) 와 3이 나오지 않아도 되는 완벽한 엔딩(3의 저주) 글고 여전히 OST는 좋더라..
